tweets.text:
The U.S. House, 228-198, passes a bill to extend the background check waiting period for gun purchases to 10 days, from three. 
3 Republicans voted "yes."
7 Democrats voted "no." 

That's two House-passed gun bills in two days for the Democratic-led chamber.
I hope we will soon vote on this common-sense bill in the Senate and start to stem the tide of gun violence in this country. https://t.co/h7Xn9QAtHt

Historic! After years of inaction, the House has finally passed legislation to prevent gun violence in our country. #HR8 will require universal background checks for all gun purchases to keep guns out of the hands of people who shouldn’t have them. #EndGunViolence https://t.co/pSuHZg5Fg2
